entry.tran: (网球，壁球运动的)正手击球，正拍
entry.def: A forehand is a shot in tennis or squash in which the palm of your hand faces the direction in which you are hitting the ball.

example.ex: Agassi saw his chance and, with another lightning forehand, reached match point.
example.tran: 阿加西看到了机会，再次以一个闪电式的正手击球拿到了赛点。

means.word_mean: 1. (sports) a return made with the palm of the hand facing the direction of the stroke (as in tennis or badminton or squash)
1. (of racket strokes) made with palm facing direction of stroke
